column5: How long will theses things last in your freezer? I've had them for around two months. Think there still fine to use?
They should be fine if they were OK when you put them in. Bill
Keep them as cold as you can in the boat.

I prepare my own and this May I used minnows from 2014. They were fine. Start with fresh minnows. From there it depends on what method you use for salting. I use coarse salt, a bit of borax and garlic powder for stink. They stay in the mixture for at least 4 hours, then they are allowed to dry in the sun before packaging and freezing.
